channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

item.description: Update Structure Fire; INC#0499; 10:30AM; 21801 W Burbank Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3MhWY7p; #WoodlandHills; The 45 year-old male (resident of the involved unit) who sustained a minor burn injury to his neck, has politely declined ambulance transport. His 95 year-old female neighbor has been taken to an area hospital by LAFD Paramedics in fair condition, following exposure to smoke from the fire. No other injuries reported. The fire cause remains under investigation. Monetary loss from the fire is still being tabulated.; FS 84; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 3; AR1 AR38 BC17 E105 E106 E273 E293 E72 E93 EM17 PH1 RA72 RA93 T73 T93; CH8; 17; Brian Humphrey

Knockdown - Structure Fire; INC#0499; 09:55AM; 21801 W Burbank Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3MhWY7p; #WoodlandHills; 43 LAFD Firefighters took just 26 minutes to access, confine and fully extinguish a vehicle and contents within the attached garage of an 1,800 square foot three-story condominium (two occupied floors above the first floor garage), that was heavily involved with fire on LAFD arrival. Though intense heat and thick smoke charged the structure, firefighters skillfully prevented the flames from extending above the garage level. Two adult civilians (unknown affiliation) sustained non-life threatening injury. They include a 45 year-old male with burn injury to his neck, and a 95 year-old female with minor respiratory complaints following smoke exposure. No ambulance transports yet. Fire cause under active investigation.; FS 84; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 3; AR1 BC17 E105 E106 E273 E293 E72 E93 EM17 RA72 RA93 T73 T93; CH9; 17; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire; INC#0499; 09:29AM; 21801 W Burbank Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3MhWY7p; #WoodlandHills; PRELIM: Fire in the attached garage of a three-story condominium (two occupied floors over the garage), with flames extending into the floors above.; FS 84; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 3; BC17 E105 E106 E273 E293 E72 E93 EM17 RA72 T73 T93; CH9; 17; Brian Humphrey

Update Trapped Vehicle - FATALITY; INC#1049; 03:38PM; 12900 W Raymer St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3WhRG0j; Valley Glen; Sadly, the patient is beyond medical help and determined dead on scene. A reduced number of LAFD units will remain to assist LAPD with body recovery as needed. Any questions are referred to LAPD Inc # 3140 for the investigation ; FS 89; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC14 E102 E260 E29 E60 E81 EM12 HR3 RA102 RA90 T60 UR88; CH8; 17; Margaret Stewart

Trapped Vehicle; INC#1049; 03:20PM; 12900 W Raymer St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3WhRG0j; Valley Glen; One vehicle struck by train (train reported to no longer be on scene) with one patient trapped. The vehicle is severely damaged and firefighters are not able to assess condition of the patient yet. Additional resource requested; FS 89; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC14 E102 E260 E29 E60 E81 EM12 HR3 RA102 RA90 T60 UR88; CH8; 17; Margaret Stewart

Technical Rescue; INC#0360; 07:36AM; 472 N Avenue 19; MAP: https://bit.ly/3IfuMAX; Elysian Park; Firefighters located a deceased person (male, age unknown) on the (dry) wash of the LA River. The circumstances surrounding the death are unknown and will be handled by LAPD investigations. Any questions are referred to LAPD Inc# 0982. No further details.; FS 1; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 13; BC1 BC2 E1 E201 E203 E3 EM1 HR3 RA1 RA3 RA803 T1 T3 UR3 UR88; CH7; 14; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0161; 03:43AM; 13456 W Ventura Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/431p4uf; Sherman Oaks; KNOCKDOWN: 54 firefighters extinguished the fire in 29 minutes with no injuries reported. The restaurant (wine bar) is in a row of commercial units (50' x 75') and the fire was contained, preventing it from extending beyond the original unit. Overhaul operations will be continuing into the morning commute and drivers are advised to avoid the area on Ventura Blvd between Greenbush Ave and Allott Ave. Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 78; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 4; BC10 BC14 BC5 CM40 CM42 E102 E108 E227 E239 E260 E27 E278 E288 E88 E89 E99 EM14 HR3 RA102 RA78 RA878 T27 T39 T60 T78 T88 UR27 UR88; CH8; 17 18; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0161; 03:14AM; 13456 W Ventura Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/431p4uf; Sherman Oaks; One story commercial building (restaurant) with fire through the roof. Firefighters are in the offensive mode. Additional resources enroute.; FS 78; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 4; BC10 BC14 BC5 CM40 CM42 E102 E108 E227 E239 E260 E27 E278 E288 E88 E89 E99 EM14 HR3 RA102 RA78 RA878 T27 T39 T60 T78 T88 UR27 UR88; CH9; 17 18; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1580; 07:45PM; 1626 W 62nd St; MAP: https://bit.ly/42ErTBI; Harvard Park; KNOCKDOWN: The first arriving 32 firefighters (additional resources had not yet been in place working at the incident) extinguished the fire in 17 minutes with no injuries reported. The fire extended into the attic. The primary and secondary search was clear with no occupants located inside. Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 66; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC13 BC18 E221 E233 E266 E33 E46 E57 E66 EM11 RA33 RA57 RA866 T21 T33 T66; CH9; 14; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1580; 07:28PM; 1626 W 62nd St; MAP: https://bit.ly/42ErTBI; Harvard Park; One story, single family dwelling with heavy smoke showing. Additional resources requested. Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 66; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC13 E221 E233 E266 E33 E46 E57 EM11 RA33 RA57 RA866 T21 T33 T66; CH9; 14; Margaret Stewart
